address: 42 Maple Leaf Drive, Vancouver, BC, Canada

experiences.description: Developing and maintaining user interfaces for various web applications. Implementing new features, optimizing performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility. Collaborating with designers and backend engineers to deliver high-quality user experiences. Mentoring junior developers on best practices.

Worked on a large-scale e-commerce platform, focusing on improving the user experience and performance.  Implemented A/B testing to optimize conversion rates. Technologies used: React, Redux, JavaScript, HTML, CSS.
Developed and maintained frontend components for web applications.  Assisted senior developers with bug fixing and code reviews. Gained experience with various frontend frameworks and libraries.

education.description: Specialized in Human-Computer Interaction.  Thesis focused on the usability of mobile applications for elderly users.
Graduated with honors.  Participated in various extracurricular activities, including the university's coding club.
